ThighsLyingGroin.name: Lying Groin Stretch
ThighsLyingGroin.preparation: Lie on floor or mat. Place soles of feet together on floor close to body with knees far apart.
ThighsLyingGroin.execution: Lower knees toward floor. Hold stretch.
ThighsLyingGroin.comments: Arms can push legs down if preferred.

ThighsKneelingSideLunge.name: Kneeling Side Lunge Stretch
ThighsKneelingSideLunge.preparation: Kneel on floor or mat. Place one foot pointing out and somewhat perpendicular to opposite kneeling leg.
ThighsKneelingSideLunge.execution: Shift upright body toward supporting foot. Hold stretch. Repeat on opposite leg.
ThighsKneelingSideLunge.comments: Push elbow into side of knee for added stretch.

ThighsPNFStraightLeg.name: PNF Straight Leg Groin Stretch
ThighsPNFStraightLeg.preparation: Instruct participant to lie on floor or mat with legs positioned straight up, slightly apart. Grasp participants ankle from inside.
ThighsPNFStraightLeg.execution: Spread legs down to sides and hold stretch.
ThighsPNFStraightLeg.comments: Administrator may need to kneel down closer to partipants who are more flexible. See PNF stretch techniques. Also see Lying Wall Groin Stretch for similar static stretch.

ThighsPNFBentLeg.name: PNF Bent Leg Groin Stretch
ThighsPNFBentLeg.preparation: Instruct participant to lie on floor or mat. Ask them to place soles of feet together on floor close to body with knees apart. Kneel close to participant and place hands on insides of participants knees.
ThighsPNFBentLeg.execution: Spread participants legs down to sides and hold stretch.
ThighsPNFBentLeg.comments: See PNF stretch techniques. Also see Lying Wall Groin Stretch for similar static stretch.

ThighsSeatedGroinFloor.name: Seated Groin Stretch
ThighsSeatedGroinFloor.preparation: Sit on floor or mat with soles of feet together on floor and close to body. Grasp feet with both hands and position elbows on inside of lower legs.
ThighsSeatedGroinFloor.execution: Press knees toward floor with elbows. Hold stretch.
ThighsSeatedGroinFloor.comments: Erector Spinae may be stretched if spine is flexed during stretch. Gluteus Maximus may be stretched if hip is flexed enough.

ThighsSeatedAdductorMagnus.name: Seated Adductor Magnus Stretch (chair or bench)
ThighsSeatedAdductorMagnus.preparation: Straddle and sit on chair or bench with feet far apart and feet on floor.
ThighsSeatedAdductorMagnus.execution: Lean forward placing finger tips or hands on floor if possible. Allow torso to be lowered downward and hold stretch.
ThighsSeatedAdductorMagnus.comments: Back may be keep straight. Other heads of Hip Adductors can be stretched if legs are positioned out as far as possible as in the Seated Groin Stretch.

ThighsSideLunge.name: Side Lunge Stretch
ThighsSideLunge.preparation: Stand with feet far apart, toes pointed 45 outward.
ThighsSideLunge.execution: Lunge toward one side. Allow foot of straight leg to point upward with heel on floor. Hold stretch. Repeat on opposite leg.
ThighsSideLunge.comments: Keep back straight during stretch. Gracilis is stretched on straight leg.

ThighsMachSeatedGroin.name: Lever Seated Groin Stretch
ThighsMachSeatedGroin.preparation: Sit on apparatus with each leg on adjacent platforms.
ThighsMachSeatedGroin.execution: Separate legs apart by turning knob. Lean forward slightly and grasp forward bar if available. Hold stretch.
ThighsMachSeatedGroin.comments: Abduction stretch is adjusted by turning knob at side. Handles can be adjusted up and down. There is also adjustment that allows knees to bend.

ThighsKneelingGroin.name: Kneeling Groin Stretch
ThighsKneelingGroin.preparation: Kneel with feet pointed out to sides. Place forearms and hands on floor.
ThighsKneelingGroin.execution: Spread knees apart and gently lower hips. Hold stretch for 20 seconds.

ThighsSeatedGroin.name: Seated Groin Stretch (chair or bench)
ThighsSeatedGroin.preparation: Sit on end of chair or bench. Place legs as far apart as possible with knees bent approximately 90 degrees and feet flat on floor pointing same direction as knees. Lean over and position upper forearms inside lower thighs near knees.
ThighsSeatedGroin.execution: Lean forward more while pushing thighs apart. Hold stretch.
ThighsSeatedGroin.comments: Adductor Magnus is stretched more as torso is lowered as in Seated Adductor Magnus Stretch.

ThighsSeatedGroinApparatus.name: Seated Groin Stretch (on apparatus)
ThighsSeatedGroinApparatus.preparation: Sit on platform facing adjustable handles. Spread legs apart and place inside of legs on outer surface of padded stumps. Straighten knees, grasp handles, and sit upright.
ThighsSeatedGroinApparatus.execution: Straighten back and pull legs further apart by pulling on handles. Hold stretch.

ThighsBentoverAdductorMagnus.name: Bent-over Adductor Magnus Stretch
ThighsBentoverAdductorMagnus.preparation: Stand with one foot on chair or bench. Bend over.

ThighsLyingWallGroin.name: Lying Wall Groin Stretch
ThighsLyingWallGroin.preparation: Sit on floor with hip and thigh against wall. Lift back of legs up against wall by pivoting on hips and lying on back. Place back of legs against wall.
ThighsLyingWallGroin.comments: Keep back of legs against wall.

ThighsSeatedSingleLegAdductorMagnus.name: Seated Single Leg Adductor Magnus Stretch
ThighsSeatedSingleLegAdductorMagnus.preparation: Sit on floor or mat and place outside of flexed leg on floor. Over that leg, position opposite leg with foot flat on floor and back of heel against shin.
ThighsSeatedSingleLegAdductorMagnus.comments: Other heads of hip adductors can be stretched if knee of upper leg travels out to side during stretch.

ThighsStandingGroin.name: Standing Groin Stretch
ThighsStandingGroin.preparation: Stand next to upper thigh height surface off to side. Hold onto elevated surface or other stable structure for balance and place inner side of nearest bent lower leg on elevated surface.
ThighsStandingGroin.execution: Lower body slightly by bending knee of base leg until stretch if felt. Repeat on opposite leg.
ThighsStandingGroin.comments: Place hands on hips or keep hand on elevated surface or other stable structure for balance.

ThighsPCGroin.name: Lever Groin Stretch
ThighsPCGroin.preparation: Sit on seat in forward position. Place hands through wrist straps. Hold lower bar with overhand grip. Position soles of feet together on top edge of shin pad.
ThighsPCGroin.execution: Push and lower seat back. Hold stretch.
ThighsPCGroin.comments: emphasizes Adductor Magnus, ischial fibers by flexing hip.

ThighsSeatedAdductorMagnusFloor.name: Seated Adductor Magnus Stretch
ThighsSeatedAdductorMagnusFloor.preparation: Sit on floor or mat with feet far apart and knees bent approximately 90 degrees. Reach forward grasp bottom of feet.
ThighsSeatedAdductorMagnusFloor.execution: Pull torso forward and hold stretch.
ThighsSeatedAdductorMagnusFloor.comments: Back may be keep straight. Other heads of Hip Adductors can be stretched if legs are positioned out as far as possible.

ThighsSquattingGroin.name: Squatting Groin Stretch
ThighsSquattingGroin.preparation: Stand with feet pointed approximately 45 outward. Squat down completely with knees pointed outward over toes. Place palms of hands on floor with inside of upper arm positioned against inner thigh.
ThighsSquattingGroin.execution: Pull thighs apart with upper arms. Hold stretch.
ThighsSquattingGroin.comments: Keep feet flat on floor and knees pointed same direction as toes. emphasizes Adductor Magnus, ischial fibers by flexing hip.

ThighsLyingAdductorMagnus.name: Lying Adductor Magnus Stretch
ThighsLyingAdductorMagnus.preparation: Lie supine on floor or mat. Raise knees and grasp back of thighs behind knees.
ThighsLyingAdductorMagnus.execution: Pull knee toward shoulders or to side of torso while keeping opposite leg on floor. Hold stretch.
ThighsLyingAdductorMagnus.comments: Keeping lower leg straight keeps pelvis from tilting so upper knee does not have to come back as far. Gluteus Maximus is stretched if hips are slightly external rotated. Piriformis and Quadratus Femoris become stretched if hip is slightly transversely adducted (knee toward opposite side of chest).

ThighsKneelingAdductorMagnus.name: Kneeling Adductor Magnus Stretch
ThighsKneelingAdductorMagnus.preparation: Kneel with one foot on floor or mat. Position torso to inside of upper thigh with hands on floor.
ThighsKneelingAdductorMagnus.comments: Other heads of hip adductors may be stretched if knee of upper leg travels out to side during stretch.
